problem.markdown: What purpose does Military Movement Drills 1 and 2 serve? (x) To develop anaerobic endurance, leg speed, and agility. ( ) To develop the ability to repeatedly sprint after changing direction. ( ) To move successfully under load.
problem.p: What purpose does Military Movement Drills 1 and 2 serve?

choicegroup.choice: To develop anaerobic endurance, leg speed, and agility.
To develop the ability to repeatedly sprint after changing direction.
